member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.Input.TryCheckInput``1(System.String,System.Func{System.String,System.Tuple{System.Boolean,System.String,``0}},System.Func{``0,System.Tuple{System.Boolean,System.String}},``0@)
member.summary: Checks input parameter for valid data type and valid data values.
member.param: A string containing a value to convert.
Converter from string to T type.

When this method returns, contains the value equivalent to the type of T contained in input, if the conversion succeeded, or default value if the conversion failed. The conversion fails if the input parameter is null, is an empty string (""), or does not contain a valid string representation of a T value. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if the input parameter was converted successfully; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Fills the RecordArguments instance with valid data.
member.param: The dictionary that contains string representation arguments values.
member.returns: true if all the properties of RecordArguments was converted from dictionary and assigned successfully; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Fills the RecordArguments instance with valid data exept Id property.
member.param: The dictionary that contains string representation arguments values.
member.returns: true if properties of RecordArguments was converted from dictionary and assigned successfully; otherwise, false.
